title: Check Box With Check

adjectives: This emoji is often seen as completed or confirmed.
verbs: It can be used to mark something as done or verified.
nouns: It represents a completed task or a confirmed item.

description: A square box with a checkmark inside, indicating completion, confirmation, or a successful selection. Used to signify tasks done or options chosen.
apple_vendor_description: The check box with check emoji on Apple devices features a pristine, slightly rounded square outlined in a crisp, dark gray, perfectly housing a bright, lively green check mark. Apple's signature realistic lighting creates a subtle dimensionality, making the check mark appear to rest within a tangible, three-dimensional space. This emoji is the ultimate symbol of a completed task, a successful selection, or a verified item, communicating a sense of order and accomplishment.
